title: Longest Palindromic Subsequence
statement:
Given a string s, find the length of the longest palindromic subsequence in s. A subsequence is a sequence that can be derived from the string by deleting some or no characters without changing the order of the remaining characters.

Note: A subsequence is different from a substring - characters need not be consecutive.
input_format: The first line contains a single string s consisting of lowercase English letters.
output_format: Print a single integer - the length of the longest palindromic subsequence.
